system.availability: User can make Navigate Test to use the seeker to find the caller, with difficulty varying on distance. Hiding a Caller on a person or object requires a Concealment Test, with Degrees of Success Opposing latyer Search Tests by those attempting to find it. A Caller can also be embedded into an object, such as a Data Slate or Weapon with a +10 Test (Tech-Use/Trade(Armourer)
system.cost: A tiny metal sphere (The Caller) and a small translucent globe with a needle of identical material to the caller inside (The Seeker). The Seeker always points to the caller regardless of distance, even over entire star sectors.
